thread.section_title: 4wheelonline.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 4wheelonline.com | www.4wheelonline.com
thread.title: Samuel B from Kentucky
thread.title_full: 4wheelonline.com reviewed by Samuel B from Kentucky

author: Samuel B from Kentucky
title: Samuel B from Kentucky
text: Bought a set of rims $100+ cheaper than summit 2nd lowest price I could find. Only inconvience was no shipping confirmation, but I can't complain with the money I saved. Maybe if you have delivery drivers with sticky fingers or live in a bad part of town; this websites not for you. I'm more than happy with my rims, great prices, and I will do business again. I highly recommend 4wheelonline.
